messages.subject: History Channel documentary on the Kaigun
messages.msgSnippet: fyi... Primetime tomorrow (11/14), The History Channel is airing a 2-hour history of the Japanese Imperial Navy.  Check local listings for air time.
messages.messageBody:
fyi...

Primetime tomorrow (11/14), The History Channel is airing a 2-hour history of the Japanese Imperial Navy. Check local listings for air time.

http://www.thehistorychannel.com/global/listings/series_showcase.jsp?EGrpType=Series&Id=11988642&NetwCode=THC
